newsitem.title: USA: Bell Atltantic, NYNEX see $200 mln more savings-NYT.
newsitem.headline: Bell Atltantic, NYNEX see $200 mln more savings-NYT.

text.p: Bell Atlantic and NYNEX Corp., which plan to merge, are pushing to generate $800 million in cost savings over three years instead of the $600 million first forecast, the New York Time said Wednesday.

The Times cited an unnamed senior Bell Atlantic executive, who was quoted as saying that as part of the cost-saving effort, the companies might end up cutting more jobs than the 3,000 jobs they initially predicted.
But the Times quoted the executive as saying the companies had not set a target of 10,000 jobs in three to five years.
